hadith.chapter: Penalty of Hunting while on Pilgrimage - كتاب جزاء الصيد
hadith.arabic-text: وعض رجل يد رجل يعني فانتزع ثنيته فأبطله النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم‏.‏
hadith.english-text: A man bit the hand of another man but in that process the latter broke one incisor tooth of the former, and the Prophet forgave the latter.
